attributes.action: Ban the use of Tasers by all parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UN has declared Tasers a "form of torture". As the UN Committee Against Torture has made such a statement, I call upon the Prime Minister to ensure these instruments are withdrawn and never used on our streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
